thorwin.math

Interface Vector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Vector2D, Vector3D

    public interface Vector
extends java.io.Serializable
    Real vector.

    • Method Summary

      • cross

        default Vector cross(Vector other)
        Calculate the cross product, also known as the 'vector product'. Note that the cross product is only defined for vectors with a dimension of 3.
        Parameters:
        other - The other vector
        Returns:
        The cross product

      • equals

        default boolean equals(Vector other,
                       double epsilon)
        Compares the two vectors for approximate equality. This method has little mathematical applicability.
        Parameters:
        other - The other vector
        epsilon - The maximum delta between element values
        Returns:
        True if approximately equal

      • lengthSquared

        default double lengthSquared()
        The squared length of this vector. The length squared calculation is considerable faster than the calculating the actual length of the vector.
        Returns:
        the length squared of the vector
